local_intent: Place the held white_plate onto the red_plate_center, detect and align the target, lower until contact, press and release, then retreat.
assumptions: white_plate is currently held in the gripper (from prior pick)
red_plate is visible and reachable from current pose
red_plate_center pose corresponds to the desired placement location
coherence_with_global: Follows GLOBAL_BT place-phase: detect red plate, move above, lower until contact, place with light press, open gripper, and retreat consistent with GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
